basics.name: Edward Sanders
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Imaginative, curious, and resourceful software engineer with a background in full-stack development. Primarily interested in front-end development and creating dynamic, intuitive, and performant interfaces that delight users. Fascinated by the intersection of design and psychology. Always striving to improve software and the processes surrounding it.

work.name: Dick's Sporting Goods
highlights: Develop full-stack applications for internal users and customers, utilizing a diverse set of technologies and platforms.
Use test-driven development (TDD) and agile methodology to write and maintain extensible, reusable, and readable code.
Pair with other developers regularly so that code quality metrics are met or exceeded.
Utilize best practices in change management, continuous integration (CI), and continuous deployment (CD) to guarantee quick turnaround time on task completion.
Gave a well-received presentation on Tailwind CSS at a company-wide tech meetup.
Actively developing an in-house component library that utilizes our company design system.
Meet shifting business needs by moving teams as needed and quickly adapting to their differing tech stacks.
Collaborate closely with product and design teams to ensure business needs and stakeholder asks are accurately translated into useful applications.
Coordinate with other teams and business units to bring delightful experiences to users.

work.name: Tobii Dynavox
highlights: Developed line-of-business applications and system integrations.
Improved development processes by encouraging and implementing best practices in project management, change management, documentation, and TDD.
Built an automated order processor that saved one team forty hours of work every week by leveraging automated PDF generation and synchronizing data across multiple systems.
Integrated OpenID Connect single-sign-on with a business critical customer facing appliications.
Created an application that helped internal user send personalized text messages to customers using the Twilio and Microsoft Graph APIs.
Designed and implemented the first version of an in-house customer management system.

work.name: VTR
highlights: Developed an LMS platform for professionals in various fields seeking continuous education credits.
Overhauled the product branding strategy, which included commissioning a new logo and implementing a design system.
